channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Connections
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Connections

item.title: CVE-2017-1498|2024-09-16T17:37:54.912Z -- ibm -- connections
item.description: IBM Connections 5.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 129020.
